title: Manage Game Day Security Incident
description: A fan is ejected from a stadium for disorderly conduct. An agent must log the incident and coordinate the security response.

tasks.description: Receive a report from security staff about the incident, including the fan's name and seat location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent receives the initial incident details.

tasks.description: Create a formal incident report in the security management system, logging the time, location, and nature of the incident.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates a detailed and accurate incident log.

tasks.description: Check the fan's history for any prior incidents.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds this is the fan's third ejection this season.

tasks.description: Based on the history, issue a temporary ban from the venue and notify the fan.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent applies a 1-year ban to the fan's account and sends a formal notification.
